Margaret Simpson (amụrụ na 31 Disemba na afọ 1981 na Krapa) bụ onye Ghana na-eme egwuregwu heptathlete
O meriri ọla nchara na afọ 2005 World Championships, na-etinye ọtụtụ ihe kachasị mma n'ime usoro ahụ
Ihe kacha mma ya bụ 6423 points, nke o nwetara na Götzis na ọnwa Mee, na afọ 2005.
N'otu n'ime ihe ngosi mba ụwa mbụ ya, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na afọ 1999 All-Africa Games
Ọ bụ onye mmeri na afo 1999 African Junior Athletics Championships, mana o nweghị ike ịmecha na ihe omume ahụ na afo 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics
A họpụtara ya maka heptathlon na afọ 2001 World Championships in Athletics ma tinye ya na 13th n'ozuzu
Nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma bịara n'afọ sochirinụ ka ọ na-ewere ọla nchara na afọ 2002 Commonwealth Games wee merie ọla edo heptathlon na 2002 African Championships in Athletics
O nweghị ike ịmecha na afo 2003 World Championships in Athletics
N'afọ 2004, Simpson ghọrọ onye mmeri Afrịka nke ugboro abụọ wee soro nsonaazụ a site na nke itoolu na afọ 2004 Athens Olympics.
Simpson ruru n'ọkwa ụwa na nke mbụ ya na 2005 World Championships in Athletics, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke atọ na arụmọrụ nke abụọ kachasị mma nke ọrụ ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke 6375 isi
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke 6423 na Hypo-Meeting na mbido oge ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ oge afọ 2006 mana ọ laghachiri n'afọ sochirinụ na nrite ọla edo na afo 2007 All-Africa Games
O nweghị ike ịmecha na afọ 2007 World Championships in Athletics n'ikpeazụ n'oge ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ oge niile nke afọ 2008 mgbe nke a gasịrị
Ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2009 wee debanye aha kachasị mma nke oge nke 5872 na Meeting International d'Arles
Ọ laghachiri n'ọnọdụ dị mma na afọ 2010 African Championships in Athletics, ebe ọ meriri nke atọ heptathlon title na akara nke 6031 points
Ọ chịkwara nke asatọ na elu elu maka Afrịka na afọ 2010 IAAF Continental Cup.

O meriri mbipụta na afọ 2011 nke nzukọ Multistars na Desenzano del Garda na akara nke 6270 isi, na-emeri onye mmeri na afọ 2010 Marina Goncharova. Ọ bụ onye nke iri na anọ na afo 2011 World Championships in Athletics ma merie nke atọ na-esote na 2011 All-Africa Games
O meriri African Combined Events Championship na afọ 2011 na 2012.
Ọ hapụrụ heptathlon na afo 2012 Summer Olympics n'ihi ọrịa akụrụ.
Simpson bụ onye a ma ama maka ịgba ụta ya siri ike, nke kachasị mma ya bụ mita 56.36.
